title: Packers-Vikings MNF Recap, Marshawn Lynch signs with Seahawks (Football 12/24)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Packers 23-10 victory over the Vikings on Monday Night Football (1:45). The guys discuss an abysmal performance from Minnesota and another primetime letdown from Kirk Cousins, while dissecting both team's chances to contend in the postseason. The Pick Six Superfriends then react to news that Marshawn Lynch is headed back to the NFL after signing with the Seahawks (18:30) and also reports that Mike McCarthy interviewed with the Panthers (31:15). Next, CBS Sports Senior NFL Reporter Jonathan Jones (48:00) joins the podcast to further breakdown 2 great games he was at this past weekend; Eagles-Cowboys and Patriots-Bills.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
